translationtableentry.text: To capture and take control of an enemy settlement, select your warriors and right-click on one of the settlement buildings.\n\nWhilst your warriors are trying to capture an enemy settlement, its loyalty decreases. Once its loyalty reaches zero, the settlement becomes yours. The more warriors you use for this task, the faster the capture will be.
